options.item: Our work is smart, stylish, often unexpected, but always on strategy - and always on brand.
More than just order takers, MKP relishes the opportunity to take a proactive role in helping you shape your marketing agenda.
From list and database expertise to print and imaging solutions and post-campaign analysis and planning, we are adept at every phase of a campaign.

Overcoming obstacles and removing headaches are among our greatest strengths. Count on our experience and production skills to get your project completed within your timeline - and within your budget.
Your account team will be accessible, professional, personable, and focused on making your job easier. We pride ourselves on adapting to your way of doing business not vice versa.
MKP believes in developing client relationships for the long term. We protect your interests, and believe that our success depends upon your success.
